message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we discussed, the market value of this product is $1000000, but I'm willing to make a special deal just for you. I'm offering it to you for $950000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it available to you because I think you're the right person for this product. What do you say? Will you take it?
